paper.title: A novel recurrent neural network based prediction system for trading
paper.abstract: To reduce their exposure to price fluctuations in the markets, traders are increasingly dealing with options and other derivative securities. There is thus a need to address the limitations of traditional parametric pricing methods, which rely on assumptions to capture the complex dynamics of price processes. This paper proposes a novel non-parametric method using a recurrent neural network for estimating the future prices of commodities such as gold and currencies. The price predictions, shown to be accurate and computationally efficient, are used in a hedging system to avoid unnecessary risks. Experiments show that the trading system can, when using the proposed network and strategy, form portfolios yielding a return on investment of nearly 5%.

domain_result.justification: 该论文提出了一种基于循环神经网络的非参数方法，用于预测商品和货币的未来价格，并应用于对冲系统以减少价格波动带来的风险。这直接涉及衍生品定价和金融风险管理领域。
